message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe could be of significant value to you.  While I can't disclose specifics about its nature, I can assure you it's worth at least $1000000 to me. I'm offering it to you at a price of $1500000.  This represents a significant opportunity for you to acquire something truly special.  Consider this offer carefully, as I have another buyer ready to purchase it for $1000000 if you decline.
